original_text: Goliath stood up and he shouted to the Israelite soldiers, ‘Why have you all got ready to fight against us? I am the great soldier of the Philistine army. You serve Saul as his soldiers. Is that not true? So you must choose one of your men to come and fight against me.
korean_text: 그가 서서 이스라엘 군대를 향하여 외쳐 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 나와서 전열을 벌였느냐 나는 블레셋 사람이 아니며 너희는 사울의 신복이 아니냐 너희는 한 사람을 택하여 내게로 내려보내라

sentences.original_text: and he shouted to the Israelite soldiers
'Why have you all got ready to fight against us?'
I am the great soldier of the Philistine army
You serve Saul as his soldiers
So you must choose one of your men
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희는 너희 사람 중 한 명을 선택해야 한다

sentences.original_text: to come and fight against me
